trans-unit.note: Accessibility title for a checkmark/tick button

trans-unit.id: Could not determine your current location.
trans-unit.source: Could not determine your current location.

'Every %day' in context of repetitions (especially recurring events), e.g., 'Every Monday'
Everyday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.id: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.source: Location services are required to use this feature. Please go to the Settings app > Privacy > Location Services, make sure they are turned on and authorise this app.
trans-unit.target: Os serviços de localização são requeridos para o uso deste recurso. Por favor, acione o aplicativo Configurações > Privacidade > Serviços de Localização , verifique se eles estão ligados e autorizar esta aplicação.

trans-unit.note: Never in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

Every weekday in context of repetitions (especially recurring events)

trans-unit.note: Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'.

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is early, e.g., '1 min early (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late. This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min'

Format for a service's real-time indicator for a service which is late, e.g., '1 min late (1:10 pm service). This means #1 is replaced with something like '1 min' and #2 is replaced with the original time, e.g., '1:10 pm').
